name: Quadra Fight
description:
Welcome to Quadra Fighter!

CONTROLS:

Use WASD or arrows to move, click and hold to shoot.  Click and hold right click to fire secondary weapon.

STORY:

You were playing a video game, but it got corrupted, and you got trapped in the simulation. Fight your way through in this exciting simulation!

TIPS:

Try to use your primary and secondary weapons at the same time. 

The performance will decrease in full screen.
